column1: Because dark matter does not seem to give off or reflect light
column4: the instruments that are used to find normal matter (like hot gas
column7: and us) can't find dark matter. It seems that dark matter is not made of the same thing as the matter we see every day on Earth. The only way we can tell if dark matter is there
column8: is by how it affects things we can "see" by gravity.In 2006
column9: a group of scientists claimed that they had found a way to find dark matter. Since dark matter is supposedly very different from normal matter
column10: it is expected to act differently. The scientists observed two far-away galaxy clusters that had crashed into each other at high speed: normal matter would have been scattered nearby after the collision
column11: while dark matter would not. By measuring gravity
column12: they were able to detect what looked like two clouds of dark matter
column13: with a cloud of normal matter (hot gas) in between them.
